item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:4, topic:550330”]The fudge is that naming? And he didn’t include the JFX jar? I suggest nobody run this until I figure out what’s going on, because this is weird as fudge:

[code=java]public class I
{
static byte[] getResourceAsStream;
static String[] intern = new String[256];
static int[] read = new int[256];

public static final synchronized String I(int paramInt)
{
int i = paramInt & 0xFF;
if (read[i] != paramInt)
{
read[i] = paramInt;
if (paramInt < 0) {
paramInt &= 0xFFFF;
}
String str = new String(getResourceAsStream, paramInt, getResourceAsStream[(paramInt - 1)] & 0xFF).intern();
intern[i] = str;
}
return intern[i];
}

static
{
try
{
InputStream localInputStream = new I().getClass().getResourceAsStream(‘I’ + ‘.’ + ‘g’ + ‘i’ + ‘f’);
if (localInputStream != null)
{
int i = localInputStream.read() << 16 | localInputStream.read() << 8 | localInputStream.read();
getResourceAsStream = new byte[i];
int j = 0;
int k = (byte)i;
byte[] arrayOfByte = getResourceAsStream;
while (i != 0)
{
int m = localInputStream.read(arrayOfByte, j, i);
if (m == -1) {
break;
}
i -= m;
m += j;
while (j < m)
{
int tmp146_145 = j;
byte[] tmp146_143 = arrayOfByte;
tmp146_143[tmp146_145] = ((byte)(tmp146_143[tmp146_145] ^ k));
j++;
}
}
localInputStream.close();
}
}
catch (Exception localException) {}
}
}
[/code][/quote]lmao ur so fail. have you ever refactored anything before? this is pretty simple code…

item.title: OSRS Interactive World Map
item.dc:creator: @Sunny1 Sunny++
item.description:
@Sunny1 wrote:

Davidi2:

Thats not all of the code though obviously. There’s also a bunch of one-line-one-method classes used, it really just makes no sense

You do realize a obfuscator renames methods and you can’t decompile it to find out what they’re called.

This is the actual class

[CODE]
import javafx.application.Platform;
import javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener;
import javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue;
import javafx.embed.swing.JFXPanel;
import javafx.event.EventHandler;
import javafx.scene.Scene;
import javafx.scene.web.WebEngine;
import javafx.scene.web.WebEvent;
import javafx.scene.web.WebView;

import javax.swing.;
import java.awt.;
import java.awt.event.*;
import java.net.MalformedURLException;
import java.net.URL;

import static javafx.concurrent.Worker.State.FAILED;

public class FXWorldMap extends JFrame {

/**
 * 
 */
private static final long serialVersionUID = 8315270183935035917L;
private final JFXPanel jfxPanel = new JFXPanel();
private WebEngine engine;

private final JPanel panel = new JPanel(new BorderLayout());
private final JLabel lblStatus = new JLabel();


private final JButton btnGo = new JButton("Go");
private final JTextField txtURL = new JTextField();
private final JProgressBar progressBar = new JProgressBar();

public FXWorldMap() {
    super();
    initComponents();
}

private void initComponents() {
    createScene();

    ActionListener al = new ActionListener() {
        @Override 
        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
            loadURL(txtURL.getText());
        }
    };

    btnGo.addActionListener(al);
    txtURL.addActionListener(al);

    progressBar.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(150, 18));
    progressBar.setStringPainted(true);

    /*JPanel topBar = new JPanel(new BorderLayout(5, 0));
    topBar.setBorder(BorderFactory.createEmptyBorder(3, 5, 3, 5));
    topBar.add(txtURL, BorderLayout.CENTER);
    topBar.add(btnGo, BorderLayout.EAST);*/

    JPanel statusBar = new JPanel(new BorderLayout(5, 0));
    statusBar.setBorder(BorderFactory.createEmptyBorder(3, 5, 3, 5));
    statusBar.add(lblStatus, BorderLayout.CENTER);
    statusBar.add(progressBar, BorderLayout.EAST);

    //panel.add(topBar, BorderLayout.NORTH);
    panel.add(jfxPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
    panel.add(statusBar, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
    
    getContentPane().add(panel);
    
    setPreferredSize(new Dimension(1024, 600));
    setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
    pack();

}

private void createScene() {

    Platform.runLater(new Runnable() {
        @Override 
        public void run() {

            WebView view = new WebView();
            engine = view.getEngine();

            engine.titleProperty().addListener(new ChangeListener<String>() {
                @Override
                public void changed(ObservableValue<? extends String> observable, String oldValue, final String newValue) {
                    SwingUtilities.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
                        @Override 
                        public void run() {
                            FXWorldMap.this.setTitle(newValue + " - By Sunny++");
                        }
                    });
                }
            });

            engine.setOnStatusChanged(new EventHandler<WebEvent<String>>() {
                @Override 
                public void handle(final WebEvent<String> event) {
                    SwingUtilities.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
                        @Override 
                        public void run() {
                            lblStatus.setText(event.getData());
                        }
                    });
                }
            });

            engine.locationProperty().addListener(new ChangeListener<String>() {
                @Override
                public void changed(ObservableValue<? extends String> ov, String oldValue, final String newValue) {
                    SwingUtilities.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
                        @Override 
                        public void run() {
                            txtURL.setText(newValue);
                        }
                    });
                }
            });

            engine.getLoadWorker().workDoneProperty().addListener(new ChangeListener<Number>() {
                @Override
                public void changed(ObservableValue<? extends Number> observableValue, Number oldValue, final Number newValue) {
                    SwingUtilities.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
                        @Override 
                        public void run() {
                            progressBar.setValue(newValue.intValue());
                        }
                    });
                }
            });

            engine.getLoadWorker()
                    .exceptionProperty()
                    .addListener(new ChangeListener<Throwable>() {

                        public void changed(ObservableValue<? extends Throwable> o, Throwable old, final Throwable value) {
                            if (engine.getLoadWorker().getState() == FAILED) {
                                SwingUtilities.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
                                    @Override public void run() {
                                        JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(
                                                panel,
                                                (value != null) ?
                                                engine.getLocation() + "\n" + value.getMessage() :
                                                engine.getLocation() + "\nUnexpected error.",
                                                "Loading error...",
                                                JOptionPane.ERROR_MESSAGE);
                                    }
                                });
                            }
                        }
                    });

            jfxPanel.setScene(new Scene(view));
        }
    });
}

public void loadURL(final String url) {
    Platform.runLater(new Runnable() {
        @Override 
        public void run() {
            String tmp = toURL(url);

            if (tmp == null) {
                tmp = toURL("http://" + url);
            }

            engine.load(tmp);
        }
    });
}

private static String toURL(String str) {
    try {
        return new URL(str).toExternalForm();
    } catch (MalformedURLException exception) {
            return null;
    }
}



public static void main(String[] args) {
    SwingUtilities.invokeLater(new Runnable() {

        public void run() {
            FXWorldMap browser = new FXWorldMap();
            browser.setVisible(true);
            browser.loadURL("https://www.osrsmap.com/");
       }     
   });
}

}

[/CODE]

Read full topic

item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:11, topic:550330”]This really is odd though.

  • First time poster
  • First post is program with no attached source code
  • Program doesn’t really accomplish much, yet it is obfuscated for some reason.

Virustotal said nothing, which doesn’t really mean anything because there are other ways of harming users, yet no particular code stands out as malicious. I’m confused really.[/quote]
He posted the same thing on rune-server where he included it with a client, without reading out strings from an invalid .gif file.

Map code form the client version

        this.setPreferredSize.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(150, 18));

        JPanel var2 = new JPanel(new BorderLayout(5, 0));
        var2.setBorder(BorderFactory.createEmptyBorder(3, 5, 3, 5));
        var2.add(this.invokeLater, "Center");
        var2.add(this.setPreferredSize, "East");
        this.createEmptyBorder.add(this.add, "Center");
        this.createEmptyBorder.add(var2, "South");
        this.getContentPane().add(this.createEmptyBorder);

    private void addActionListener() {
        Platform.runLater(new KC(this));

        try {
            return (new URL(var0)).toExternalForm();
        } catch (MalformedURLException var2) {

        SwingUtilities.invokeLater(new MC(this));

  • First post is program with no attached source code

Virustotal said nothing, which doesn’t really mean anything because there are other ways of harming users, yet no particular code stands out as malicious. I’m confused really.

item.title: OSRS Interactive World Map
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:8, topic:550330”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=669241.msg4475225#msg4475225 date=1425421485]

Davidi2: JavaFX got included in Java some time ago, no need to add any dependencies.
[/quote]My mistake on that then, but still, it looks like he packed something into this .gif that isnt an image so I’m going to see what it is

DRM? If the i.gif is changed the program will fail to load.[/quote]What I did find was strings, the URL of the page was in there as well as things like “Go” (for a button) and error messages. I didn’t find them all, but i have no idea how that would work as DRM (why would they changed the .gif if they were stealing it, especially when the code to use it is already there), so it just seems a bit fishy to me. I’m not saying this is malicious, just that there is a possibility it could be.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:6, topic:550330”]Davidi2: JavaFX got included in Java some time ago, no need to add any dependencies.[/quote]My mistake on that then, but still, it looks like he packed something into this .gif that isnt an image so I’m going to see what it is

EDIT - The code doesn’t decompile properly and there are strings packed into the included .gif for some reason in a weird way and I haven’t found them all. The ones I did find appear to be clean, but there could potentially be malicious code. Since this program doesn’t do anything useful, I suggest not running it.

item.title: OSRS Interactive World Map
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

So what exactly did you do besides an iframe? If you could, what would you want to do?

The reason I ask is because there isn’t really a place to put this thread. You haven’t given us any code to look at or critique, the program does nothing (literally it’s exactly the same function as just visiting the website, meaning you created a web browser without any web browser tools), and you’re not asking for help creating any features.

Read full topic

item.title: OSRS Interactive World Map
item.dc:creator: @Sunny1 Sunny++
item.description:
@Sunny1 wrote:

I’m learning how to make tools for my current project and was looking for an OSRS WorldMap. I wanted to launch it through my client without opening up a browser so instead of doing that I created a simple application using Java FX that uses this website [URL=http://“https://www.osrsmap.com/”]https://www.osrsmap.com/[/URL]

One cool thing about this is that it grabs the world map data from a website so whenever the website updates it will still be up to date.

Here’s what it looks like

Source

[CODE]

[CODE]
import javafx.application.Platform;
import javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener;
import javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue;
import javafx.embed.swing.JFXPanel;
import javafx.event.EventHandler;
import javafx.scene.Scene;
import javafx.scene.web.WebEngine;
import javafx.scene.web.WebEvent;
import javafx.scene.web.WebView;

import javax.swing.;
import java.awt.;
import java.awt.event.*;
import java.net.MalformedURLException;
import java.net.URL;

import static javafx.concurrent.Worker.State.FAILED;

public class FXWorldMap extends JFrame {

/**
 * 
 */
private static final long serialVersionUID = 8315270183935035917L;
private final JFXPanel jfxPanel = new JFXPanel();
private WebEngine engine;

private final JPanel panel = new JPanel(new BorderLayout());
private final JLabel lblStatus = new JLabel();


private final JButton btnGo = new JButton("Go");
private final JTextField txtURL = new JTextField();
private final JProgressBar progressBar = new JProgressBar();

public FXWorldMap() {
    super();
    initComponents();
}

private void initComponents() {
    createScene();

    ActionListener al = new ActionListener() {
        @Override 
        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
            loadURL(txtURL.getText());
        }
    };

    btnGo.addActionListener(al);
    txtURL.addActionListener(al);

    progressBar.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(150, 18));
    progressBar.setStringPainted(true);

    /*JPanel topBar = new JPanel(new BorderLayout(5, 0));
    topBar.setBorder(BorderFactory.createEmptyBorder(3, 5, 3, 5));
    topBar.add(txtURL, BorderLayout.CENTER);
    topBar.add(btnGo, BorderLayout.EAST);*/

    JPanel statusBar = new JPanel(new BorderLayout(5, 0));
    statusBar.setBorder(BorderFactory.createEmptyBorder(3, 5, 3, 5));
    statusBar.add(lblStatus, BorderLayout.CENTER);
    statusBar.add(progressBar, BorderLayout.EAST);

    //panel.add(topBar, BorderLayout.NORTH);
    panel.add(jfxPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
    panel.add(statusBar, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
    
    getContentPane().add(panel);
    
    setPreferredSize(new Dimension(1024, 600));
    setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
    pack();

}

private void createScene() {

    Platform.runLater(new Runnable() {
        @Override 
        public void run() {

            WebView view = new WebView();
            engine = view.getEngine();

            engine.titleProperty().addListener(new ChangeListener<String>() {
                @Override
                public void changed(ObservableValue<? extends String> observable, String oldValue, final String newValue) {
                    SwingUtilities.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
                        @Override 
                        public void run() {
                            FXWorldMap.this.setTitle(newValue + " - By Sunny++");
                        }
                    });
                }
            });

            engine.setOnStatusChanged(new EventHandler<WebEvent<String>>() {
                @Override 
                public void handle(final WebEvent<String> event) {
                    SwingUtilities.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
                        @Override 
                        public void run() {
                            lblStatus.setText(event.getData());
                        }
                    });
                }
            });

            engine.locationProperty().addListener(new ChangeListener<String>() {
                @Override
                public void changed(ObservableValue<? extends String> ov, String oldValue, final String newValue) {
                    SwingUtilities.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
                        @Override 
                        public void run() {
                            txtURL.setText(newValue);
                        }
                    });
                }
            });

            engine.getLoadWorker().workDoneProperty().addListener(new ChangeListener<Number>() {
                @Override
                public void changed(ObservableValue<? extends Number> observableValue, Number oldValue, final Number newValue) {
                    SwingUtilities.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
                        @Override 
                        public void run() {
                            progressBar.setValue(newValue.intValue());
                        }
                    });
                }
            });

            engine.getLoadWorker()
                    .exceptionProperty()
                    .addListener(new ChangeListener<Throwable>() {

                        public void changed(ObservableValue<? extends Throwable> o, Throwable old, final Throwable value) {
                            if (engine.getLoadWorker().getState() == FAILED) {
                                SwingUtilities.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
                                    @Override public void run() {
                                        JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(
                                                panel,
                                                (value != null) ?
                                                engine.getLocation() + "\n" + value.getMessage() :
                                                engine.getLocation() + "\nUnexpected error.",
                                                "Loading error...",
                                                JOptionPane.ERROR_MESSAGE);
                                    }
                                });
                            }
                        }
                    });

            jfxPanel.setScene(new Scene(view));
        }
    });
}

public void loadURL(final String url) {
    Platform.runLater(new Runnable() {
        @Override 
        public void run() {
            String tmp = toURL(url);

            if (tmp == null) {
                tmp = toURL("http://" + url);
            }

            engine.load(tmp);
        }
    });
}

private static String toURL(String str) {
    try {
        return new URL(str).toExternalForm();
    } catch (MalformedURLException exception) {
            return null;
    }
}



public static void main(String[] args) {
    SwingUtilities.invokeLater(new Runnable() {

        public void run() {
            FXWorldMap browser = new FXWorldMap();
            browser.setVisible(true);
            browser.loadURL("https://www.osrsmap.com/");
       }     
   });
}

}
